card_text: A "Black Luster Soldier" monster Ritual Summoned using this card gains these effects. You can only use this effect of "Evening Twilight Knight" once per turn.$N●Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it.$N●Once per turn: You can banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand face-down, until your opponent's next End Phase.$NIf this card is banished from your Graveyard: You can add 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Evening Twilight Knight" once per turn.
